    merged: jpeach@samba.org-20070422050150-hfsj0mkjzmbbfr0y
    parent: jerry@samba.org-20070421230439-176wm5ijn4we5bzm
    committer: jpeach@samba.org
    branch nick: SAMBA_3_0.bzr
    timestamp: Sun 2007-04-22 00:01:50 -0500
    message:
      jpeach@samba.org (r22441)  2007-04-21 22:17:31 -0500 (Sat, 21 Apr 2007)
          
          Add automatic dependency tracking. The dependency generation is
          toolchain independent, but since there's no portable method for
          doing makefile includes, we can actually use the dependencies with
          GNU make. It's easy to add this for other makes, but I don't have
          any to test.
          
          This also moves as much m4 as possible into the m4 directory where
          no-one has to look at it. AFAICT, there's no way to hide depcomp
          in there too, which is unfortunate.
          
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    merged: jerry@samba.org-20070421230439-176wm5ijn4we5bzm
    parent: idra@samba.org-20070421230213-v7b95zemjtech946

    merged: jpeach@samba.org-20070420230510-vmysae7zx06foswc
    parent: jpeach@samba.org-20070420230334-1ftv086xt7kmwwmr
    committer: jpeach@samba.org
    branch nick: SAMBA_3_0.bzr
    timestamp: Fri 2007-04-20 18:05:10 -0500
    message:
      jpeach@samba.org (r22418)  2007-04-20 16:09:44 -0500 (Fri, 20 Apr 2007)
          
          Support running under launchd. We abstract the method of obtaining
          sockets to listen on a little, because in the launchd case these
          are provided for us. We also add an idle timeout so that a daemon
          can exit after a period of inactivity.
          
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    merged: jpeach@samba.org-20070420230334-1ftv086xt7kmwwmr

    merged: obnox@samba.org-20070420170155-37z23f88zlhwbo2f
    parent: gd@samba.org-20070420110457-1icsd6idfq9vncxe
    committer: obnox@samba.org
    branch nick: SAMBA_3_0.bzr
    timestamp: Fri 2007-04-20 12:01:55 -0500
    message:
      obnox@samba.org (r22411)  2007-04-20 07:06:38 -0500 (Fri, 20 Apr 2007)
          
          Fix the build:
          
          Prototype of create_aio_ex_read, set_message and definition of
          UNIXERROR have changed in r22389 and r22391? to require an additional
          "inbuf" argument. Some places in smbd/aio.c had not been adapted.
          
          This patch fixes the build.
          
          Michael
          
          
    ------------------------------------------------------------

    parent: herb@samba.org-20070420050637-8mb7c1hdtll9mzot

    branch nick: SAMBA_3_0.bzr
    timestamp: Fri 2007-04-20 06:02:28 -0500
    message:
      obnox@samba.org (r22401)  2007-04-20 05:27:33 -0500 (Fri, 20 Apr 2007)
          
          
          Add bzr revision+nick support to mkversion.sh.
          
          The plan is to actually synchronize with SAMBA_4_0's mkversion.sh,
          which is more elaborate. But there are a few differences in 
          behaviour I still have to check. So I am cheching this here in for
          a start...
          
          Michael
          
          
    ------------------------------------------------------------

    message:
      idra@samba.org (r22392)  2007-04-19 18:15:33 -0500 (Thu, 19 Apr 2007)
          
          
          Remove leftover potentially segfaulty code.
          Check we are online before actually trying to connect anywhere
          
          
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    merged: jra@samba.org-20070419230658-hpiwortybnx5w4wk
    parent: jerry@samba.org-20070419230518-lko7wfvbol6w0awy
    committer: jra@samba.org
    branch nick: SAMBA_3_0.bzr
    timestamp: Thu 2007-04-19 18:06:58 -0500
    message:
      jra@samba.org (r22391)  2007-04-19 17:40:32 -0500 (Thu, 19 Apr 2007)
          
          Looks bigger than it is. Make "inbuf" available
          to all callers of smb_setlen (via set_message()
          calls). This will allow the server to reflect back
          the correct encryption context.
          Jeremy.
          
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    merged: jerry@samba.org-20070419230518-lko7wfvbol6w0awy
    parent: jra@samba.org-20070419230347-m57v6lk1ikub5r98
    committer: jerry@samba.org
    branch nick: SAMBA_3_0.bzr
    timestamp: Thu 2007-04-19 18:05:18 -0500
    message:
      jerry@samba.org (r22390)  2007-04-19 17:26:09 -0500 (Thu, 19 Apr 2007)
          
          Patchset sent to samba-technical to address the winbind 
          loop when allocating a new id for a SID:
          
          
          auth_util.patch		Revert create_local_token() to
          the 3.0.24 codebase
          
          idmap_type.patch	Have the caller fillin the
          id_map.xid.type field when
          resolving a SID so that if we allocate
          a new id, we know what type to use
          
          winbindd_api.patch	Remove the WINBINDD_SIDS_TO_XIDS calls
          from the public winbindd interface
          for the 3.0.25 release
          
          idmap_rid.patch		Cleanup the idmap_rid backend to not
          call back into winbindd to resolve
          the SID in order to verify it's type.
          
          
          
          
          
          
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    merged: jra@samba.org-20070419230347-m57v6lk1ikub5r98
    parent: idra@samba.org-20070419230201-wxchng3d55kx06i7
    committer: jra@samba.org
    branch nick: SAMBA_3_0.bzr
